law.text: Any prisoner having served the term for which he has been sentenced for a crime he committed after June 16, 1972, less good time deduction, if any has been accumulated, shall be released by minimum expiration of sentence.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 445, sec. 11, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1980. --Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 24(14). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 292, sec. 1.
